comment: /**  * Return the bean info for the given class, if supported.  * @param beanClass the bean class  * @return the BeanInfo, or {@code null} if the given class is not supported  * @throws IntrospectionException in case of exceptions  */
code: /**  * Return the bean info for the given class, if supported.  * @param beanClass the bean class  * @return the BeanInfo, or {@code null} if the given class is not supported  * @throws IntrospectionException in case of exceptions  */ @Nullable BeanInfo getBeanInfo(Class<?> beanClass) throws IntrospectionException.
